message.name: ERR_ELIGIBILITY_FV_FROM_DATE_TO_DATE_ZERO
message.locale: The reassessment 'From Date' and 'To Date' must not be empty.

message.name: ERR_ELIGIBILITY_XFV_FROM_DATE_TO_DATE
message.locale: The reassessment 'From Date' must be before or equal to the reassessment 'To Date'.

message.name: INF_REASSESSMENT_QUEUED
message.locale: Your request for reassessment of this case has been queued for processing, a notification will be raised for you when this has completed.

message.name: ERR_REASSESSMENT_INVALID_CASE_STATUS
message.locale: Case %1s could not be reassessed as it currently has a status of '%2s'.

message.name: ERR_REASSESSMENT_CURRENTLY_ACTIVE
message.locale: Cannot manually reassess case %1s as it is currently being reassessed.

message.name: ERR_ACTIVATION_REASSESSMENT_CURRENTLY_ACTIVE
message.locale: Cannot activate case %1s as it is currently being reassessed.

message.name: INF_REASSESSMENT_CHANGES_PENDING
message.locale: Reassessment due to changes made on %1z has been queued for processing.

message.name: INF_REASSESSMENT_DEFERRED_TO_BATCH
message.locale: Reassessment started on %1z has been deferred to batch processing.

message.name: INF_REASSESSMENT_IN_PROGRESS_WITH_PENDING_CHANGES
message.locale: Reassessment currently in progress since %1z. Reassessment due to changes made on %2z has been queued for processing.

message.name: INF_REASSESSMENT_FAILED_BATCH
message.locale: Batch reassessment has failed for this case on %1z. Please contact an Administrator.

message.name: ERR_MANUAL_REASSESSMENT_INVALID_CASE_STATUS
message.locale: Case %1s could not be reassessed as it has never been activated and it currently has a status of %2s.
